name: M.C. Russia 2: Back to Jurrasic Park
name_original: M.C. Russia 2: Back to Jurrasic Park
description: Welcome to a world of just fucking Dinosaurs. You the gamer play as the cringy mastermind, M.C. Russia. Blasting your way through countless encounters with the retarded dinosaurs. As you travel your way, you will meet friends and become the dopest rapper of all time and save humanity from dinosaurs being so retarded.
